context: F5 introduced the Application Delivery and Security Platform (ADSP) in 2025, unifying application delivery, API protection, and threat mitigation across hardware, software, and SaaS. F5 made strategic acquisitions: LeakSignal (March 2025) for AI application data protection, Fletch (June 2025) for agentic AI threat detection, and MantisNet (August 2025) for eBPF-based network observability. Competition intensified in API security, AI application protection, and cloud-native WAAP.

competitors.name: Akamai
competitors.notes: Major competitor in Cloud Web Application and API Protection (WAAP) market
